content: this narwhal amigurumi pattern includes one pdf file with detailed instructions pictures and videos about how to crochet and assemble all the parts of this toy the pattern contains 8 pages of instructional material accompanied by 46 photos and 1 video of processes crochet level beginner pattern available in english only american terminology used in the description only basic crocheting skills will be needed to make this pattern amigurumi ring slip_stitch chain single_crochet increasing decreasing double_crochet and treable crochet materials - yarn for body fins tail and horn weight category 2 fine type sport 5 ply 12 wpi i use yarn art jeans 55% cotton / 45% acrylic 174yd/160m 1 8oz/50g colors 35 and 81 for body fins and tail use blue color or another that you like for horn use contrast color for example pink yellow etc - thin black yarn for embroidering i use yarn art iris 100% cotton 0 7 oz / 151 yards / 138 m / 20 g color 935 black you can use other thin yarn for example yarn for embroidery or sewing - stuffing materials i use hollow fiber - scissors - crochet hook i use 2 mm size size b to usa classification - needle pins toys size ~ 6 7 inches 17 cm using the materials described
